public String getName()
        Gets streamer name. Must be unique within grid.
        Returns:

      • getWindows

        public Collection<StreamerWindow> getWindows()
        Gets collection of streamer event windows. At least one window should be configured. Each window must have unique name.
        Returns:
        Streamer windows.

      • getStages

        public Collection<StreamerStage> getStages()
        Gets collection of streamer stages. Streamer must have at least one stage to execute. Each stage must have unique name.
        Returns:
        Collection of streamer stages.

      • setStages

        public void setStages(Collection<StreamerStage> stages)
        Sets stages.
        Parameters:
        stages - Stages.

      • isAtLeastOnce

        public boolean isAtLeastOnce()
        Gets flag indicating whether streamer should track event execution sessions and failover event execution if any failure detected or any node on which execution happened has left the grid before successful response is received.

        Setting this flag to true will guarantee that all pipeline stages will be executed at least once for each group of event submitted to streamer (or failure listener will be notified if failover cannot succeed). However, it does not guarantee that each stage will be executed at most once.

        Returns:
        True if event should be processed at least once, or false if failures can be safely ignored.

      • setAtLeastOnce

        public void setAtLeastOnce(boolean atLeastOnce)
        Parameters:
        atLeastOnce - True to guarantee that event will be processed at least once.

      • getMaximumFailoverAttempts

        public int getMaximumFailoverAttempts()
        Gets maximum number of failover attempts to try when pipeline execution has failed. This parameter is ignored if isAtLeastOnce() is set to false.

        If not set, default value is

        Returns:
        Maximum number of failover attempts to try.

      • setMaximumFailoverAttempts

        public void setMaximumFailoverAttempts(int maxFailoverAttempts)
        Sets maximum number of failover attempts.
        Parameters:
        maxFailoverAttempts - Maximum number of failover attempts.
        See Also:
        getMaximumFailoverAttempts()

      • getMaximumConcurrentSessions

        public int getMaximumConcurrentSessions()
        Gets maximum number of concurrent events to be processed by streamer. This property is taken into account when isAtLeastOnce() is set to true. If not positive, number of sessions will not be limited by any value.
        Returns:
        Maximum number of concurrent events to be processed. If number of concurrent events is greater then this value, caller will be blocked until enough responses are received.

      • setMaximumConcurrentSessions

        public void setMaximumConcurrentSessions(int maxConcurrentSessions)
        Sets maximum number of concurrent sessions.
        Parameters:
        maxConcurrentSessions - Maximum number of concurrent sessions.
        See Also:
        getMaximumConcurrentSessions()

      • getThreadPoolSize

        public int getThreadPoolSize()
        Gets streamer pool size. Defines a thread pool size in which streamer stages will be executed.

        If not specified, thread pool executor with max pool size equal to number of cores will be created.

        Returns:
        Streamer thread pool size.

      • setThreadPoolSize

        public void setThreadPoolSize(int poolSize)
        Sets streamer pool size.
        Parameters:
        poolSize - Pool size.
        See Also:
        getThreadPoolSize()
